data.name: Cooking Festival
data.detailed_description:
ğŸŒ½ğŸ–ğŸ†BAKE, FRY and GRILLğŸŒ½ğŸ–ğŸ† your way AROUND THE WORLD!ğŸ—½

Cooking Festival is a simple point and click time management game.

As the Chef in your restaurant you combine ingredients, serve dishes and upgrade your kitchen to increase efficiency and keep your customers satisfied. You have to hurry up as waiting for food makes customers grumpy and they will leave when waiting for too long. Make use of multiple stoves and ovens in your kitchen but stay focused as burned food will have to be thrown out!

Five worlds consisting of four restaurants each with each restaurant having between 10 and 60 levels to complete (480 levels in total!) along with special buildings, characters and challenges to unlock that bring many hours of cooking fun!

ğŸ‘‰Youâ€™re the MASTER CHEF the cooking world has been waiting for - the most talented, well trained, and most promising ğŸ’¥FOOD ARTISTğŸ’¥ in the known universe!

data.short_description: Cooking Festival takes you to the tasty world of fantastic cuisine - let's cook!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: API DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: API DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
